original_title: Jean-Michel Frank – Tragisches Genie des Art déco
overview: Jean-Michel Frank designed style-defining interiors in the 1920s with the timeless ideal of simplicity. He worked in Paris with artists like Giacometti and Dali, and designed interiors for millionaires like Nelson Rockefeller and Templeton Crocker. The documentary tells of an amazing but tragic life of the innovative interior designer.
title: Jean-Michel Frank - Tragic Genius of Art Deco
